chargeHist.descr: Take and Drive Vehicle w/o Consent
Take and Drive Vehicle w/o Consent

result.execSummary:
The defendant Joshua Vernon Price was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Drive or Operate Vehicle w/o Consent, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.23(3).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Sentenced to 19 days in the Pepin County Jail with credit for 19 days served.
Court waives costs including the DNA surcharge.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.descr: Drive or Operate Vehicle w/o Consent
charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice and acknowledge of def voting ineligibility

records.addlTxt: Defendant Joshua Vernon Price in court with attorney Roger M Hillestad.  Defendant Joshua Vernon Price in custody.  Jon D Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Count 1 of Information amended to 943.23(3) Class I Felony, advised of max penalties.  Defendant pleads no contest to amended charge.  PLQ/WRF filed with the Court and reviewed with defendant.  Court finds defendant's WCR & Plea done knowingly & voluntarily, accepts plea and finds defendant guilty.  Sentence to 19 days in the PCJ with credit for 19 days serve.  Court waives costs.  DNA same ordered, DNA surcharge waived.  Advised of felony conviction penalties.  Appeal rights given.  14TR37 dismissed.
Defendant's Motion for Reduction of Bond
Letter from defendant requesting reconsideration of bail.
Plea/sentencing hearing on February 3, 2014 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Joshua Vernon Price in court with attorney Roger M Hillestad.  Defendant Joshua Vernon Price in custody.  Jon D Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advises defendant of elements of count 1 as stated in the Information & max. penalties.  Advised of all rights.  NGP entered.  Atty Hillestad and defendant requests Signature Bond.  Court orders Bond remain as previously set.

Defendant Joshua Vernon Price in court with attorney Roger M Hillestad.  Defendant Joshua Vernon Price in custody.  Jon D Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sworn by the State Chief Deputy Greg Balow.  Cross by defense counsel.  Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  State files Information with the Court.  Defendant wishes to proceed with Arraignment.
G.S.B. is required to appear on 01/21/2014 @ 11:00 am

Hon. James J. Duvall, Court Reporter and Jon D Seifert, appearing for the State of Wisconsin all appearing by phone from Buffalo County Courtroom.  Defendant Joshua Vernon Price in court in Pepin County, in custody.  Judge advises defendant of charges/max. penalties and rights including the right to an attorney and the right to a preliminary hearing.  State requests $2500 cash bond.  Court sets cash bond of $2500.00.  Defendant to contact the SPD.  Preliminary Hrg. to be set in 10 days.
